I humbly accept.\""},{"lineNumber":160878,"originalJapaneseLine":"別の魔物将軍が恭しく頭を下げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Another monster general bowed respectfully."},{"lineNumber":160879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、やはりお前はやめておこう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, on second thought, I think I'll pass on you after all.\""},{"lineNumber":160880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":160881,"originalJapaneseLine":"希望的な言葉を前に魔物将軍が顔を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hearing these hopeful words, the monster general raised his face."},{"lineNumber":160882,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、次の瞬間、その顔が歪む。","translatedEnglishLine":"But in the next moment, his face twisted."},{"lineNumber":160883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様、今返事が少し遅れたな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You, your reply was a bit slow just now..."},{"lineNumber":160884,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の側近に軍規が守れぬ者はいらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't want anyone who can't follow military rules among my close aides.\""},{"lineNumber":160885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴様、さてはスパイだな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You, you're a spy, aren't you?\""},{"lineNumber":160886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、あ、なにを……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha, wh-what are you...!\""},{"lineNumber":160887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、うむ、スパイだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, yes, you are a spy."},{"lineNumber":160888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スパイに間違いない」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no mistake about it.\""},{"lineNumber":160889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい！　こいつも拷問にかけろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! Torture him too!\""},{"lineNumber":160890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、う、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":160891,"originalJapaneseLine":"あまりの展開に何も言うことが出来ず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Unable to say anything due to the overwhelming development,"},{"lineNumber":160892,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍は自分の部下に引きずられていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the monster general was dragged away by his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":160893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やれやれ、これでは心の安まる暇がない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief, with this, there is no time to rest my mind..."},{"lineNumber":160894,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おいお前、あいつらの代わりに私の側近を務めろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, you, serve as my close aide in their place.\""},{"lineNumber":160895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！　謹んでお受けいたします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes! I humbly accept!\""},{"lineNumber":160896,"originalJapaneseLine":"打てば響くように即座に返ってきた言葉、","translatedEnglishLine":"The words came back instantly, as if striking a chord,"},{"lineNumber":160897,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフは安堵の溜め息を漏らした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Joseph sighed with relief."},{"lineNumber":160898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ、これでいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, this is good.\""},{"lineNumber":160899,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフはようやく満足げに頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Joseph finally nodded with satisfaction."},{"lineNumber":160900,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス――","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas—"},{"lineNumber":160901,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas Castle—"},{"lineNumber":160902,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がリーザス城の正門前にいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others were in front of the main gate of Leazas Castle."},{"lineNumber":160903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くぅーっ、ようやく着いたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuu—, we've finally arrived, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":160904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わぁー、相変わらずお城、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, the castle is as lavish as ever,"},{"lineNumber":160905,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても豪華ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's really magnificent...\""},{"lineNumber":160906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きょろきょろするな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop looking around so much."},{"lineNumber":160907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　田舎者だと笑われるだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"They'll laugh at you for being a country bumpkin.\""},{"lineNumber":160908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはははは！　ランスちゃーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha! Rance-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":160909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれ？　声？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, huh? A voice?\""},{"lineNumber":160910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……この、力の抜ける底抜けに脳天気な声は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This utterly carefree and laid-back voice is...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそがヨシフの考えであった。
病的な疑心暗鬼の塊、大将軍ヨシフ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph, the great general, was a mass of pathological suspicion and paranoia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然、彼の部下は日々極度の緊張に晒されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Naturally, his subordinates were subjected to extreme tension every day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぐっ！　ぐうっ！」
ようやく解放され、
魔物将軍が床に這いずり、頭を抑えている間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while the monster general crawled on the floor holding his head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは別の兵に冷徹に命令を下す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph coldly gave orders to another soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こいつを拷問にかけろ。
別の大将軍と繋がっている可能性がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He may be connected to another great general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、繋がりがあることは明白。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's clear there is a connection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとしても情報を引き出せ」
「ひっ、誤解です！　わ、私はそのような！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hik, it's a misunderstanding! I, I am not like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで魔物将軍の部下であった兵が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier who had been the monster general's subordinate until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼を両脇から羽交い締めにし、
秘密の部屋へと連れて行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and took him to a secret room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていかれた者がどうなるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happens to those taken away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはヨシフの側近である魔物将軍も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was well known even to the monster general, Joseph's close aide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく知るところだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was very familiar with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、あらん限りに叫ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he shouted with all his might.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うあぁあぁぁああぁあ！
い、嫌だァ！　信じて、ください！　ああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, I don't want this! Please believe me! Aaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁあああぁああああああああぁぁああ！！！！」
「ふんっ、見苦しい奴め……」
「おい、お前。
今の奴の代わりに私の秘書として働け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Work as my secretary in place of that guy just now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はい……謹んでお受けいたします」
別の魔物将軍が恭しく頭を下げる。
「……いや、やはりお前はやめておこう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, on second thought, I think I'll pass on you after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 希望的な言葉を前に魔物将軍が顔を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hearing these hopeful words, the monster general raised his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、次の瞬間、その顔が歪む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But in the next moment, his face twisted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様、今返事が少し遅れたな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, your reply was a bit slow just now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の側近に軍規が守れぬ者はいらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want anyone who can't follow military rules among my close aides."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……貴様、さてはスパイだな？」
「は、あ、なにを……！」
「……いや、うむ、スパイだな。
スパイに間違いない」
「おい！　こいつも拷問にかけろ！」
あまりの展開に何も言うことが出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to say anything due to the overwhelming development,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は自分の部下に引きずられていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster general was dragged away by his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ、これでは心の安まる暇がない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief, with this, there is no time to rest my mind...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいお前、あいつらの代わりに私の側近を務めろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you, serve as my close aide in their place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！　謹んでお受けいたします！」
打てば響くように即座に返ってきた言葉、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The words came back instantly, as if striking a chord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは安堵の溜め息を漏らした。
「……うむ、これでいい」
ヨシフはようやく満足げに頷いた。
リーザス――
リーザス城――
ランス達がリーザス城の正門前にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were in front of the main gate of Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くぅーっ、ようやく着いたか」
「わぁー、相変わらずお城、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, the castle is as lavish as ever,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても豪華ですね……」
「きょろきょろするな。
田舎者だと笑われるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They'll laugh at you for being a country bumpkin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはははは！　ランスちゃーーん！」
「あ、あれ？　声？」
「……この、力の抜ける底抜けに脳天気な声は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This utterly carefree and laid-back voice is..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそがヨシフの考えであった。
病的な疑心暗鬼の塊、大将軍ヨシフ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph, the great general, was a mass of pathological suspicion and paranoia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然、彼の部下は日々極度の緊張に晒されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Naturally, his subordinates were subjected to extreme tension every day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぐっ！　ぐうっ！」
ようやく解放され、
魔物将軍が床に這いずり、頭を抑えている間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while the monster general crawled on the floor holding his head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは別の兵に冷徹に命令を下す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Joseph coldly gave orders to another soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こいつを拷問にかけろ。
別の大将軍と繋がっている可能性がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He may be connected to another great general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、繋がりがあることは明白。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's clear there is a connection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとしても情報を引き出せ」
「ひっ、誤解です！　わ、私はそのような！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hik, it's a misunderstanding! I, I am not like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで魔物将軍の部下であった兵が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier who had been the monster general's subordinate until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼を両脇から羽交い締めにし、
秘密の部屋へと連れて行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and took him to a secret room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていかれた者がどうなるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happens to those taken away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはヨシフの側近である魔物将軍も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was well known even to the monster general, Joseph's close aide.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく知るところだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was very familiar with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、あらん限りに叫ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he shouted with all his might.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うあぁあぁぁああぁあ！
い、嫌だァ！　信じて、ください！　ああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, I don't want this! Please believe me! Aaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁあああぁああああああああぁぁああ！！！！」
「ふんっ、見苦しい奴め……」
「おい、お前。
今の奴の代わりに私の秘書として働け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Work as my secretary in place of that guy just now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はい……謹んでお受けいたします」
別の魔物将軍が恭しく頭を下げる。
「……いや、やはりお前はやめておこう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, on second thought, I think I'll pass on you after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 希望的な言葉を前に魔物将軍が顔を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hearing these hopeful words, the monster general raised his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、次の瞬間、その顔が歪む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But in the next moment, his face twisted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様、今返事が少し遅れたな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, your reply was a bit slow just now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の側近に軍規が守れぬ者はいらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want anyone who can't follow military rules among my close aides."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……貴様、さてはスパイだな？」
「は、あ、なにを……！」
「……いや、うむ、スパイだな。
スパイに間違いない」
「おい！　こいつも拷問にかけろ！」
あまりの展開に何も言うことが出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to say anything due to the overwhelming development,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は自分の部下に引きずられていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster general was dragged away by his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ、これでは心の安まる暇がない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief, with this, there is no time to rest my mind...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいお前、あいつらの代わりに私の側近を務めろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you, serve as my close aide in their place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！　謹んでお受けいたします！」
打てば響くように即座に返ってきた言葉、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The words came back instantly, as if striking a chord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは安堵の溜め息を漏らした。
「……うむ、これでいい」
ヨシフはようやく満足げに頷いた。
リーザス――
リーザス城――
ランス達がリーザス城の正門前にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were in front of the main gate of Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くぅーっ、ようやく着いたか」
「わぁー、相変わらずお城、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, the castle is as lavish as ever,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても豪華ですね……」
「きょろきょろするな。
田舎者だと笑われるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They'll laugh at you for being a country bumpkin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはははは！　ランスちゃーーん！」
「あ、あれ？　声？」
「……この、力の抜ける底抜けに脳天気な声は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...This utterly carefree and laid-back voice is..."
